description:
A visiting Professor at Beacon Academy as well as a Huntsman specializing in Nightmare Grimm. He continues his journey to research this threat and save their victims. Shion is invited by Ozpin to help Team RWBY in confronting the threat of the Nightmare. He uses special items to capture the Nightmare, and his Semblance allows him to send the hearts of other into a sleeper`s dream.
Source: Official page
name: Shion Zaiden
